 Congenital disorders:  If the fetus is suspected with a health issue or congenital disease, there is risk for 
complications during pregnancy. This requires additional monitoring or baby needs special care at birth. 
 Gestational diabetes: The pregnancy hormones don’t maintain the body metabolism to keep the blood sugar 
levels stable. A glucose screening test needs to be done to detect diabetes in pregnancy. Most people can keep
